column1: Preceded by Publius Decius Mus II and Quintus Fabius Maximus Rullianus III#Consul of the Roman Republic 296 BC with Lucius Volumnius Flamma Violens II#Succeeded by Quintus Marcius Tremulus and Publius Cornelius Arvina
